alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 26 at 2:25PM MDT until August 26 at 5:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Garfield County in southern Utah... * Until 530 PM MDT. * At 225 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across Calf Creek, Death Hollow slot canyon, and the Upper Escalante River. Between 0.5 and 1.0 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, normally dry washes, and slot canyon areas. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Death Hollow Slot Canyon, Calf Creek, and the Upper Escalante River. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
